name: 黃如瑩
objective: 本課程旨在進一步加強學生的口語表達溝通之能力。經由合宜的活動設計，如小組討論，與英語談話情境的塑造，如面談，學生將獲得充分機會以演練聽講的技巧。
schedule:
Week  1 2/18   Introduction
Week  2 2/25   Principles of communication
Week  3 3/4    Principles of conversation
Week  4 3/11   Important dislogues in ”The Queen”
Week  5 3/18   Important dialogues in ”Scent of a Woman”
Week  6 3/25   Important dialogues in ”Minority Report”
Week  7 4/1    Important dialogues in ”City of Desire”
Week  8 4/8    Mid-term: oral test (I)
Week  9 4/15   Mid-term: oral test (II)
Week 10 4/22   IMportant dialogues in ”Hancock”
Week 12 4/29   Important dialogues in ”A Strange Tale of Benjamin”
Week 13 5/6    Important dialogues in ”Never Give Up”
Week 14 5/13   Important dialogues in ”The Blue Butterfly”
Week 15 5/20   Important dialogues in ”Amy's World”
Week 16 5/27   Important dialogues in ”The Accidental Spring”
Week 17 6/3    Oral presentation of final project (I)
Week 18 6/10   Oral presentation of final project (II)
scorePolicy:
1. Attendance: 20%
2. Participation in dialogue practice: 20%
3. Oral presentation of useful expressions for conversation: 30%
4. Tests of useful expressions used in dialogues: 30%
